CustomField.description: Issues to be resolved before the Assignment can be included in a 2cloudnine Pay Batch
CustomField.formula: If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payee__c ) , "No Payee" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Employee__c ) , "No Employee" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Payment_Entity__c ) , "No Payment Entity" & BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Schedule__c ) , "No Schedule" &BR() , "" ) & If ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Assignment_Start_Date__c ) , "No Assignment Start Date" &BR() , "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Issues to be resolved before the Assignment can be included in a 2cloudnine Pay Batch
CustomField.label: Assignment Incomplete Reasons
